org.apache.mahout.math.flavor

Interface MatrixFlavor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MatrixFlavor.FlavorImpl

    public interface MatrixFlavor
    A set of matrix structure properties that I denote as "flavor" (by analogy to quarks)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  MatrixFlavor.FlavorImpl 

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static MatrixFlavor DENSELIKE
      This default for DenseMatrix-like structures
      static MatrixFlavor DIAGONALLIKE
      This is default flavor for DiagonalMatrix and the likes.
      static MatrixFlavor SPARSELIKE
      This is default flavor for SparseRowMatrix-like.
      static MatrixFlavor SPARSEROWLIKE
      This is default flavor for SparseMatrix-like structures, i.e.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BackEnum getBacking()
      Whether matrix is backed by a native system -- such as java memory, lapack/atlas, Magma etc.
      TraversingStructureEnum getStructure()
      Structure flavors
      boolean isDense() 

    • Field Detail

      • DENSELIKE

        static final MatrixFlavor DENSELIKE
        This default for DenseMatrix-like structures

      • SPARSELIKE

        static final MatrixFlavor SPARSELIKE
        This is default flavor for SparseRowMatrix-like.

      • SPARSEROWLIKE

        static final MatrixFlavor SPARSEROWLIKE
        This is default flavor for SparseMatrix-like structures, i.e. sparse matrix blocks, where few, perhaps most, rows may be missing entirely.

      • DIAGONALLIKE

        static final MatrixFlavor DIAGONALLIKE
        This is default flavor for DiagonalMatrix and the likes.

    • Method Detail

        Structure flavors
